name: Flood Factory Escape
description:
“Flood Factory Escape” is a simple and addictive platform game.
The main pump in the machinery factory was damaged. More and more water like a wild beat flood over the whole factory. But there is still one worker waiting for quit out. So you need to help and save him life. Jump and run to escape from rapidly rising water level! Good Luck!

How to Play:
- Tap screen to jump
